MECANIZADOS MOAN
![](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/recurso_azul.png)Service to all types of SectorsPetrochemical, mineral, aluminum, energy, iron and steel, ... Mecanizados Moan undertakes manufacturing with demanding quality requirements.

## Experience

More than 20 years of experience in the metalworking sector.

![ISO 9001 y 14001](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/logos_calidad_home.png)

## Quality

Certified with the UNE-EN-ISO 9001: 2015 and 14001: 2015 standards

## Contact Mecanizados Moan

Mecanizados Moan will look for a solution to your needs.

[CONTACT](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/en/contacto/)

# CNC milling and boring, CNC Turning, Machine desinging and manufacturing

##### Since its foundation in 2000, **Mecanizados Moan** has carried out with enthusiasm and professionalism, fundamental pillars of this Company, solutions for the industrial sector in the manufacture and repair of industrial machinery parts.

![Oficina técnica](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/oficina_tecnica.jpg)

## Technical office

Mecanizados Moan has a technical office capable of undertaking projects of elements covered by both the machinery directive (2006/42 / CE) and the pressure equipment directive (2014-68-UE)

[Leer Más](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/oficina-tecnica/)

![Mecanizados CNC](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/mecanizados_cnc.jpg)

## Machining

In **Mecanizados Moan**, parts are manufactured and / or repaired thanks to the capacity of the tooling and machinery of its facilities.

[Read More](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/en/mecanizados/)

![Calderería](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/caldereria.jpg)

## Boilermaking and welding

**Mecanizados Moan** offers the manufacturing and / or repair service according to a plan or sample of all kinds of boilermaking equipment for **industrial facilities**, as well as machines, mechanisms, tools, lifting tables …

[Read More](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/en/caldereria-y-soldadura/)

![Mantenimiento industrial](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/mantenimiento.jpg)

## Industrial maintenance

Mecanizados Moan offers the maintenance service to all types of companies: Maintenance, repair and provision of auxiliary services in assemblies and installations …

[Read More](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/en/mantenimiento/)

![Oficina técnica](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/oficina_tecnica.jpg)

## Technical office

Mecanizados Moan has a technical office capable of undertaking projects of elements covered by both the machinery directive (2006/42 / CE) and the pressure equipment directive (2014-68-UE)

[Leer Más](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/oficina-tecnica/)

![Mecanizados CNC](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/mecanizados_cnc.jpg)

## Machining

In **Mecanizados Moan**, parts are manufactured and / or repaired thanks to the capacity of the tooling and machinery of its facilities.

[Read More](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/en/mecanizados/)

1. [1](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/#)
2. [2](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/#)
3. [3](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/#)
4. [4](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/#)

##### From **Mecanizados Moan** we offer the possibility of fully managing the entire process of repair and manufacturing of industrial machinery, including **CE marking** (design development, drawing drawing, part manufacturing and assembly of the machine or equipment at the customer’s premises). We also offer the possibility of managing the maintenance of **industrial facilities**.

![](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/investimento_2024.jpg)

![Axudas IGAPE](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/igape.jpg)

![](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/plan_recuperacion_2024.jpg)

![ayudas](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/moan_igape_industrias40.jpeg)

# Sectors

##### Attending to the needs of its customers, Mecanizados Moan undertakes manufacturing with demanding and unique quality requirements for all types of sectors.

![Petroquimico](https://www.mecanizados-moan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/petroquimico.jpg)
